title: Wear Cheat Sheet / Notes
summary: Store notes on your phone and view them on your Android Wear watch!
description: Whether you want to have some notes quickly accessible or have an exam you could use a few extra notes for, Quick Notes is perfect for any situation!Simply add the Categories of notes and then the individual notes on your phone. Open up the app on the watch side and they are all there and no one knows!Perfect for that "no notes test" you aren't prepared for :)Just make sure you don't check the time too often!--HOW TO USE---1) Enter notes and categories on phone2) Fist time users need to open the app on the watch manually first and make sure to sync your apps to your watch!3) Press the "Open On Watch"**Whenever you wish to update your watches notes just click the "Open On Watch" button.And thats all it takes! --Features---Click and hold on a old category to delete it-Click and hold on a note and select a color for it to distinguish it.
descriptionHTML:
Whether you want to have some notes quickly accessible or have an exam you could use a few extra notes for, Quick Notes is perfect for any situation!

Simply add the Categories of notes and then the individual notes on your phone. Open up the app on the watch side and they are all there and no one knows!

Perfect for that "no notes test" you aren't prepared for :)
Just make sure you don't check the time too often!

--HOW TO USE---
1) Enter notes and categories on phone
2) Fist time users need to open the app on the watch manually first and make sure to sync your apps to your watch!
3) Press the "Open On Watch"

**Whenever you wish to update your watches notes just click the "Open On Watch" button.

And thats all it takes!

--Features--
-Click and hold on a old category to delete it
-Click and hold on a note and select a color for it to distinguish it.
comments: Money grab Funny on how you decide to monetize the app considering you have 100 downloads.
